title: Tammy Hembrow wears a TINY bikini at the beach with her two children
text:
She juggles motherhood with running a thriving fitness empire.

And Tammy Hembrow took time out of her busy schedule on Thursday to enjoy a day out with her son Wolf, four, and daughter Saskia, three.

The activewear entrepreneur, 25, shared a sweet photo to Instagram of the family spending time at the beach.

'I love you so deeply': On Thursday, Tammy Hembrow shared a sweet photo to Instagram which showed her spending time at the beach with her son Wolf, four, and daughter Saskia, three

The blonde bombshell flaunted her curves in a barely-there string bikini, while posing at an angle to show off her tattoos.

She kissed little Saskia on the cheek as Wolf smiled happily for the camera.

'I love you so deeply,' she captioned the heartwarming snap.

Doting mother: The social media influencer captioned her post, 'I love you so deeply'

It comes after Daily Mail Australia revealed a rare gallery of images that showed a side to Tammy's personality her 10 million social media followers rarely see.

Last week, the businesswoman donated $6,000 to the Gold Coast Hospital Foundation.

After posing for a photo holding an oversized cheque, she said: 'I've worked with quite a few charities but none have been as close to my heart.

Multi-talented: It comes after Daily Mail Australia revealed a rare gallery of images that showed a side to Tammy's personality her 10 million social media followers rarely see

'It was a pleasure to visit them this morning and learn more about their plans. They're making a huge difference in the hospital and my hometown community.'

Days later, Tammy attended Business News Australia's Young Entrepreneur Awards on the Gold Coast with her Saski Collection team.

She co-founded the activewear brand with her sister Amy Hembrow in 2017, and they now employ several staff members and ship worldwide.

Philanthropist: Last week, Tammy donated $6,000 to the Gold Coast Hospital Foundation

Designer of the year! Days later, Tammy attended Business News Australia's Young Entrepreneur Awards with her Saski Collection team, where she was recognised for using her social media following 'to create a business to be reckoned with in the online retail world'

Tammy was recognised at the event for 'leveraging her social media following to create a business to be reckoned with in the online retail world'.

She shares custody of her kids with ex-fiancé Reece Hawkins, who is now dating American model London Goheen.

The mother-of-two is currently in a relationship with Canadian rapper Jahkoy Palmer.
description: The activewear entrepreneur, 25, shared a sweet  photo to Instagram of the family spending time at the beach
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
